fields.name: NOTICE_DATE
fields.doc: date and time of notice creation

fields.name: TRIGGER_NUM
fields.doc: string of alpha and digits uniquely identifying event

fields.name: SEG_NUM
fields.doc: Swift serial number (for Swift notice types only)

fields.name: SRC_RA
fields.doc: RA of the pointing direction of the s/c in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: SRC_DEC
fields.doc: Dec of of the pointing direction of the s/c in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: IMG_START_DATE
fields.doc: the Truncated Julian Day when this data packet was generated on-board [TJD]

fields.name: IMG_START_TIME
fields.doc: the UT seconds-of-day (SOD) when this data packet was generated on-board [SOD]

fields.name: COUNTS
fields.doc: calculated number of events in the centroid

fields.name: MIN_COUNT
fields.doc: minimum number of events needed to calculate a proper centroid

fields.name: STD_DEV
fields.doc: standard deviation of any centroid found in the image

fields.name: SIG_MAX
fields.doc: maximum allowable std-deviation for a valid centroid

fields.name: PH2_ITER
fields.doc: number of iterations used in Phase 2 of the search algorithm

fields.name: MAX_ITER
fields.doc: maximum number of iterations used in Phase 2 of the search algorithm

fields.name: ERROR_CODE
fields.doc: value for why a position was not found.  The values are:  1= no source found in image, 2= algorithm did not converge, 3= standard deviation too large, and 0xFFF= general error

fields.name: MISC_19
fields.doc: 32 Flag Bits. See https://gcn.gsfc.nasa.gov/sock_pkt_def_doc.html for definition of bits, some bits may not be defined
